ygData.subject: Intro
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi everyone.  I joined in as soon as I heard about this list.  I ve played muds for years and have been playing everquest since beta.  I m looking forward to
ygData.messageBody: Hi everyone. I joined in as soon as I heard about this list. I've played muds for years and have been playing everquest since beta. I'm looking forward to playing with a "gay" group. It would be nice to have people to chat with who enjoy the same things and are like me. Let's see, I'm 30 years old, married (to a woman). We've been together a little over a year now. She plays in EQ as well. I hope to see you all online. I started a dwarf paladin in these server that was mentioned in prior posts, her name is Zoltarena. I also have a lv 9 druid in Tunare. Her name is Miile. Look me up!
